title: Bayer CropScience 's revenue 2005 to 2018
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Revenues in million euros. In total the number of data points it has is 14.
In general Revenues in million euros has rose over the Year.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2017 and 2018.
Maximum Revenues in million euros, about 14266.0 was reported at Year 2018
The lowest Revenues in million euros, of value 5700.0 was reported at Year 2006
